Package gui.CEOScreens

Class CEOMainScreenController2

java.lang.Object
gui.ScreenController
gui.CEOScreens.CEOMainScreenController2
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CEOMainScreenController2 extends ScreenController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
CEOMainScreenController2 class is a controller class for the CEO main screen It handles the actions and events that occur on the CEO main screen, and updates the corresponding views. This class extends the ScreenController class and implements the Initializable interface.
Author:
Ravid Goldin, Ben Ben Baruch
